about_the_game:
Desta: The Memories Between (Original Game Soundtrack) features 12 beautiful, atmospheric and ethereal tracks written and performed by acclaimed UK musician and music producer Mansur Brown in his very first game soundtrack.

Each track was written and designed to perfectly complement falling into Desta’s dream, written and designed to match the storytelling and emotions as you progress through the night.

Find the right words to say in Desta: The Memories Between, a cosy team-based tactics adventure. Encounter old friends, unlock new abilities, land trick-shots to resolve memories, all while falling deeper into a mysterious world. Dream Team Edition includes all updates, artbook and OST.
